meaningMnemonic: The <kanji>skin</kanji> under your <kanji>skin</kanji> is still <vocabulary>skin</vocabulary>. The extra layer is there to make sure when you get little cuts they don't bleed all over the place.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
